metadata.title: CVE-2016-5732 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in the partition-rangeimplementation in templates/table/structure/display_partitions.phtml in thetable-structure page in phpMyAdmin 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allow remoteattackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via crafted tableparameters.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5732` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

phpmyadmin - 4:4.6.3-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.3-1').
